### About SSD2020

Students can register to give a short talk (15 minutes, including
questions) or to participate in the poster session (50 minutes). Group
presentations and posters are welcomed; 

For graduate research presentations, please contact Dr. Watagoda for scheduling in the special
graduate session. For undergraduate honors thesis presentations,

please contact Dr. Cook for scheduling.
Last date for presenter registration: Wednesday, April 24

## Register to present

Fill out the [registration form](https://goo.gl/forms/5TDegJoTEoY6oetC3) to register as a presenter.
